portfolio print

A Printed Lab Slip Form

Prescription order forms filled out by the hand of Doctors always in a hurry make legibility difficult for the folks on the receiving end. This form was designed to guide these hands to improve legibility. Look closely.

portfolio email

A Simple HTML Email Newsletter

Designed to have the “Mad Men” look, this internal newsletter is intended for employees only to receive on their iPads. It takes advantage of Apple iOS features: the font is “Avenir Next” and all images are retina ready.
